text: "Only Wanna Be with You" is a 1995 song by Hootie & the Blowfish. It is from their debut studio album Cracked Rear View. It topped the single charts in Canada. It also went to top 40 in Australia, Iceland, El Salvador, New Zealand and the United States. It was covered by Post Malone in 2021. ==Track listings== ==References== Category:1995 songs Category:Hootie & the Blowfish songs Category:Post Malone songs Category:Alternative rock songs Category:Roots rock songs
title: Only Wanna Be with You
